T02TD2005E:213a-0: @213a // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //
T02TD2005E:213a-1: sngags pas rtag tu bsten pa ni //
T02TD2005E:213a-2: rus sbal 'o ma zhes bya ba //
T02TD2005E:213a-3: de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang //
T02TD2005E:213a-4: 'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni //
T02TD2005E:213a-5: de bzhin me yi khu ba dang //
T02TD2005E:213a-6: sgra snang gi ni rdzas dag dang //
T02TD2005E:213a-7: 'di rnams rtag tu sbyar na ni //
T02TD2005E:213a-8: rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing //
T02TD2005E:213a-9: tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang //
T02TD2005E:213a-10: rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab //
T02TD2005E:213a-11: lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD2005E:213a-12: 'di la spyad par mi bya ste //
T02TD2005E:213b-0: @213b yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung //
T02TD2005E:213b-1: ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin brlabs na //
T02TD2005E:213b-2: las kyi rnam smin sbyong bar byed //
T02TD2005E:213b-3: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas //
T02TD2005E:213b-4: de bzhin cho ga bzhin du bsten //
T02TD2005E:213b-5: chos gcig skya rengs shar ba ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-6: snod la ma reg rus sbal zho //
T02TD2005E:213b-7: drod ma yal bar btung ba 'am ;
T02TD2005E:213b-8: / yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung //
T02TD2005E:213b-9: mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la //
T02TD2005E:213b-10: 'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-11: de nyid nas ni gzung bar bya //
T02TD2005E:213b-12: zhag gsum chu yi char pa gtang //
T02TD2005E:213b-13: 'o ma de bcad bza' bar bya //
T02TD2005E:213b-14: yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung //
T02TD2005E:213b-15: 'jim pa skam po sbyar nas ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-16: zhag gsum chu yi nang du sbang //
T02TD2005E:213b-17: de blangs nas ni yang skams nas //
T02TD2005E:213b-18: phye ma byi la'i spar tshad re //
T02TD2005E:213b-19: ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas //
T02TD2005E:213b-20: sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya //
T02TD2005E:213b-21: me yi sngon po ser po ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-22: sa yi mar gyis dril nas ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-23: kha sbyar sbyor dang ldan byas nas //
T02TD2005E:213b-24: me chu sa yis btsir nas ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-25: btung ba'am nyi ma'i sbu gus btung //
T02TD2005E:213b-26: lan tshva bral ba dag la ni //
T02TD2005E:213b-27: zhag gsum 'chi ba'i sgra brnyan rdzas //
T02TD2005E:213b-28: nam gyi dus la sngags pas blangs //
T02TD2005E:213b-29: cha gsum snod du zhag gsum gzhag / kha yi cha ni byug pa ste //
T02TD2005E:213b-30: dbus ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid //
T02TD2005E:213b-31: rtsa ba'i cha ni dor ba sti ;
T02TD2005E:213b-32: /'di rnams so sor bstan pa na //
T02TD2005E:213b-33: tha mal 'bras bu gsum gyi phye //
T02TD2005E:213b-34: byi la'i sbar tshad de dang sbyar //
T02TD2005E:213b-35: ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med //
T02TD2005E:213b-36: tshogs par bstan nas bzla bar bya //
T02TD2005E:213b-37: re re bsten yang nyes pa med //
T02TD2005E:213b-38: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bstan pa'i cho ga rdzogs so /
